Hero.title: Renewal, Balance, Healing.
Hero.description: Sothis Therapeutic Massage embodies renewal and the flow of energy, supporting your journey toward wellness, healing, and a fresh beginning in body and mind.

Services.title: Our Service
Services.subtitle: A holistic approach tailored to your specific needs.

therapeuticMassage.title: Therapeutic Massage
therapeuticMassage.description: Experience a customized blend of techniques including Swedish and Deep Tissue designed to specific needs. Whether you seek relief from chronic pain, muscle tension, or simply wish to unwind, our therapeutic massage promotes deep relaxation, improved circulation, and overall well-being.

Benefits.title: Massage Benefits
Benefits.subtitle: Massage goes beyond just relaxing you it also helps:

circulation.title: Improve Blood Circulation
circulation.description: Enhanced circulation delivers oxygen and nutrients throughout your body, promoting healing and vitality.

anxiety.title: Relieve Anxiety
anxiety.description: Therapeutic touch reduces stress hormones and promotes relaxation, helping you find calm and peace.

fibromyalgia.title: Relieve Symptoms of Fibromyalgia
fibromyalgia.description: Targeted massage techniques can help reduce pain, stiffness, and fatigue associated with fibromyalgia.

immuneSystem.title: Enhancement of the Immune System
immuneSystem.description: Regular massage supports your body's natural defense system, helping you stay healthy and resilient.

Testimonials.title: What Clients Say
Testimonials.review1: “The best massage I've ever had! The atmosphere is so calming and I left feeling completely rejuvenated.”
Testimonials.review2: “I've struggled with back pain for years, but after a few sessions at SOTHIS, I feel like a new person.”

AboutPage.title: About - Sothis Therapeutic Massage | Nancy Raza, LMT
AboutPage.description: Learn about Nancy Raza and the meaning of Sothis. Therapeutic massage in Edgewater, NJ focused on renewal, healing, and wellness.

ServicesPage.title: Services - Sothis Therapeutic Massage | Edgewater, NJ
ServicesPage.description: Therapeutic massage, wellness, and healing services by Nancy Raza in Edgewater, NJ. Improve circulation, relieve anxiety, and enhance your immune system.
ServicesPage.heading: Our Services
ServicesPage.subheading: Choose the treatment that best suits your needs. All sessions include a consultation to ensure personalized care.

therapeutic.title: Therapeutic Massage
therapeutic.description: A customized blend of techniques tailored to your specific needs. Ideal for stress relief, pain management, muscle tension, and overall relaxation. Each session includes a consultation to ensure personalized care focused on your wellness goals.

deepTissue.title: Deep Tissue Massage
deepTissue.description: Ideal for releasing persistent muscle knots and relieving chronic pain in areas such as the lower back and shoulders.

sports.title: Sports Massage
sports.description: Designed for athletes; focuses on injury prevention, post-training muscle recovery, and pre-event preparation.

triggerPoint.title: Trigger Point Therapy
triggerPoint.description: Application of sustained and specific pressure on hypersensitive points to relieve referred pain and restore muscle function.

benefits.title: Therapeutic Massage Benefits
items: Pain Reduction and Muscle Tension Relief
Enhanced Flexibility and Range of Motion
